task.title: Changing Passphrase
task.shortdesc: This section explains how to change the passphrase.

context.p: The following steps explain the process of changing the passphrase:

step.cmd: Create a file system session using an RFs object.

step.info: Create an object of type CUnifiedKeyStore using CUnifiedKeyStore::NewL() or CUnifiedKeyStore::NewLC().
Initialize the member functions and keystore using the asynchronous function CUnifiedKeyStore::Initialize().
Obtain the authentication object of a key using the CCTKeyInfo::Protector() function.
Invoke the ChangeReferenceData() function for the authentication object obtained. The keystore prompts the user to enter the old and new passphrases.

result.p: The passphrase is changed for the selected key, if the old passphrase is entered correctly.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code snippet shows how to set use policy for a key.
